title: Larry Fink ‘very bullish’ on Bitcoin after IBIT’s record-breaking performance
description:
BlackRock CEO Larry Fink said the record-breaking performance of IBIT has made him more bullish about the future of Bitcoin. Fink made the statement during an interview on Fox Business on March 27, where he called the company’s spot Bitcoin ETF the most rapidly expanding fund in history. He also stated: “I’m very bullish on […]

The post Larry Fink ‘very bullish’ on Bitcoin after IBIT’s record-breaking performance appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: UK Regulators Release Guidance for ‘Finfluencers’ and Memes Promoting Financial Products
description:
Regulators in the United Kingdom are releasing new regulations for influencers and memes that promote financial products. In a new press release, the UK’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) is giving out new guidelines on how social media can be used to promote financial products, including fintech and digital assets, as a means of combating fraud. […]

The post UK Regulators Release Guidance for ‘Finfluencers’ and Memes Promoting Financial Products appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
